Uses of Interface
com.appglu.android.cache.CacheManager

Packages that use CacheManager
com.appglu.android The main package of AppGlu's Android SDK.
Contains the SDK's main class AppGlu and some utility classes to provide asynchronous execution using AsyncTask. 
com.appglu.android.cache Contains the CacheManager interface and it's implementations.
A CacheManager is used for storing and caching files while using the StorageApi. 
com.appglu.android.storage Contains the Storage API implementation for Android.
The Storage API has methods to download and cache files from AppGlu server.
 
 

Uses of CacheManager in com.appglu.android
 

Methods in com.appglu.android with parameters of type CacheManager
 void AppGluSettings.setDefaultStorageCacheManager(CacheManager storageCacheManager)
          A CacheManager is used for storing and caching files while using the StorageApi.
static StorageApi AppGlu.storageApi(CacheManager storageCacheManager)
          Returns a StorageApi object that has methods to download and cache files from AppGlu server.
 

Uses of CacheManager in com.appglu.android.cache
 

Classes in com.appglu.android.cache that implement CacheManager
 class FileSystemCacheManager
          CacheManager implementation that will store the files on disk.
FileSystemCacheManager will first try the external storage, if it is available, if not it will use the internal storage.
It is possible to set the maximum number of bytes used on disk by calling FileSystemCacheManager.setMaxCacheSizeInBytes(long).
 class MemoryAndFileSystemCacheManager
          CacheManager implementation that will store the files on memory and disk together, forming a two-level cache.
When retrieving the file it will first look on memory, if not found it will try the disk.
The maximum number of items on memory and the maximum number of bytes used on disk can be defined if the constructor MemoryAndFileSystemCacheManager.MemoryAndFileSystemCacheManager(Context, int, long) is used.
 class MemoryCacheManager
          CacheManager implementation that will store the files on memory.
It is possible to set the maximum number of items on memory but calling MemoryCacheManager.setMaxCacheSizeInNumberOfItems(int).
 

Uses of CacheManager in com.appglu.android.storage
 

Constructors in com.appglu.android.storage with parameters of type CacheManager
StorageService(StorageOperations storageOperations, CacheManager cacheManager)
